name: Redshift
overview:
It is the year 2240 and the evil forces of the seventh colony have gained control over the eight worlds of the solarian constellation. Your mission set by the solarian chief council, is to regain control over all eight worlds. To recapture a world you have to destroy it's surface, machinery and organic structures. The seventh colony has manufactured various small fighter crafts to hinder your mission and destroy your ship by firing small homing bombs at you.
Your ship, the Redshift 15A, is equipped with triple laser banks, anti-matter turbo drive, holomap terrain scanner and solaray energy inductors. But be aware that the laser banks, turbo drive and terrain scanner may fail at low energy levels.
